dcterms:description: The WMT21 metrics shared task evaluated the performance of 15 automated metrics by comparing their ratings to human ones on the output of several machine translation systems and several language pairs, focusing on the English to German language pair and the news domain.
dcterms:title: WMT 21

dcterms:description: Spot-The-Bot is a framework for evaluating conversational dialogue systems, where dialogues between two systems are sampled and humans classify each interlocutor as either a human or a bot.
dcterms:title: Spot-The-Bot
